about_the_game:
STORY :

During the years after Christ, exorcism was performed in some churches and by some priests.
There were people who were possessed by demons without any sign of illness and fell victim to this terrible fate.
The salvation and healing of the soul and body of these people due to the lack of authority and harming themselves and others was often done in the church or in secret places away from the community.

This story is about a girl named (Jane) who finds herself in one of these places that is out of control and has been abandoned for years and must seek her survival.

Can she escape from this hell?

In this game, you play the role of (Jane) who is caught and imprisoned in a scary place due to an accident (which is the will of demons) and you have to endure the fear to save your life. Fight, Strive and Survive.

In this game, special puzzles related to the story are used and you have rarely experienced them in this series of games.

In some parts of the game, you will encounter the style of stealth and action, and in order to survive, you must hide from the demons or destroy them and save your life.

The narrative and story of the game will introduce you to the style of the game and we have tried to create special, scary and attractive moments for you.


With NVIDIA DLSS Features ( RTX Graphic Cards ) Double FPS / Ray Reconstruction

STORY :

During the years after Christ, exorcism was performed in some churches and by some priests.
There were people who were possessed by demons without any sign of illness and fell victim to this terrible fate.
The salvation and healing of the soul and body of these people due to the lack of authority and harming themselves and others was often done in the church or in secret places away from the community.

This story is about a girl named (Jane) who finds herself in one of these places that is out of control and has been abandoned for years and must seek her survival.

Can she escape from this hell?

In this game, you play the role of (Jane) who is caught and imprisoned in a scary place due to an accident (which is the will of demons) and you have to endure the fear to save your life. Fight, Strive and Survive.

In this game, special puzzles related to the story are used and you have rarely experienced them in this series of games.

In some parts of the game, you will encounter the style of stealth and action, and in order to survive, you must hide from the demons or destroy them and save your life.

The narrative and story of the game will introduce you to the style of the game and we have tried to create special, scary and attractive moments for you.

name: The Hell + Me : Exorcise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD™ Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space GB available space

short_description: Exorcise is the first title of ( The Hell + Me ) game series. In this game you In an underground place occupied by demons you must try to survive and find your way by solving puzzles and destroying the demons. Are you ready for an exorcism?
supported_languages:
English*, Persian
*languages with full audio support
